channel.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
channel.description:
Has anyone had some?
I remember when i first started playing, me and my friend have always thought that Zezima made RuneScape since he was #1 on hiscores and that the cabbages at the cabbage thingy at lumby or draynor (can't really remember which) were his xD.
A little earlier i was thinking NPCs were players.
This 1 time i was in the wilderness exploring, i saw a few ghosts that attacked me so i started running and since i was a lil stupid back then i thought the white dot (which is me on the minimap) was the ghost and that red flag which appears when u click somewhere, was me. So i kept running and was like omg! fuck im gonna die!#Q@#$#

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:37, topic:331162”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=427524.msg3140247#msg3140247 date=1267421570]

A guy that gave me a steel platebody and kiteshield became my best friend. :o

Holy shit same here
[/quote]

I’m not joking, I haven’t played Runescape in like 4 ish years and I still remember his username, ‘Ipe98’ <3[/quote]
The guy that gave me the steel plate, etc., was “tommygunn70”, or something like that. Haven’t seen or heard of him in ages. Probably quit. I get on RuneScape once every few months.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I traded a rune kite for an adamant halberd, and turned down 80k for the halberd.
Also, I went to godwars with full veracs thinking i could solo. I forgot the protect item prayer and lost the helm. Was going FML the whole day :3

Read full topic

i thought i was cooler than my friends because i had black and they had steel

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

on my first day there was someone giving away rune items in lumbridge… i quickly ccepted full rune and a rune battle axe from him…

the day after i sold the lot to my best online friend for like 1.3k
i thought i was rich untill i managed to find varrock and saw people selling it for 180k…

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

I scammed full rune off somebody, I said I could trim it for free.

Earlier on, I traded full iron with my friend for a pot and 24 coins :|.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

-I thought I was amazing when someone made me full addy.
-I thought running away from an NPC wouldn’t work
-I cried and cried when someone stole two gold bars from me
-A moderator kept talking to me when I reported something and I never read
-I asked a moderator why “kkok” was blocked out (sigh)
-Many more

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

wow, there are some pretty epic moments here xD

heres a few of mine:

i went for a walk when i was level 8 and found rimmington, went upstairs in one of the houses and went OMG A BRONZE SCIMMI!
i grabbed a full inventory, repeated for a few days, and soon realised my fail

i was a girl when i was a lvl 8 aswell, and some horny dude decided he wanted to marry me
so he took me to the port sarim ring shop and got my a 300 gp gold ring, i sold it straight after he logged out xD

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:

SilentCJ:

A guy that gave me a steel platebody and kiteshield became my best friend. :o

Holy shit same here

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I had a rough start…lets see…
I didn’t note anything until around 30
I thought i was scamming people and they would report me when they bought cowhides at 100+ ea
When my friend told me about hidden mods/admins, I got paranoid and didn’t trade anyone for a week
I always ran to lvl 41 wildy, grabbed the sapphire, ran back to edge, banked, and repeated
When my friend first told me about the wildy, i was expecting alot more trees…
And my personal favorite:I didn’t know about member vs non member and would always go to lvl 13 wildy looking for dragons to slay… Needless to say i never found any

Read full topic

item.title: Funny RuneScape newbie moments
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I also go lost in white knight castle because i was always to scared to go to far across the bridge north, and i never saw the north exit. One of my friends had to come save me.

Read full topic
